trans-unit.source: Prerequisites

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites

target.mrk: Conditions préalables

trans-unit.source: Replication Prerequisites

seg-source.mrk: Replication Prerequisites

target.mrk: Conditions préalables à la réplication

trans-unit.source: These are the prerequisites to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> replication:

seg-source.mrk: These are the prerequisites to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> replication:

target.mrk: Les conditions préalables à l’utilisation de la réplication <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sont :

trans-unit.source: A license with the replication option activated is mandatory

seg-source.mrk: A license with the replication option activated is mandatory

target.mrk: Une licence avec l'option de réplication activée est obligatoire.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination servers must:

seg-source.mrk: The source and destination servers must:

target.mrk: Les serveurs source et destination doivent :

trans-unit.source: Be installed on different physical servers.

seg-source.mrk: Be installed on different physical servers.

target.mrk: Être installés sur des serveurs physiques différents.

trans-unit.source: Have the same <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version.

seg-source.mrk: Have the same <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version.

target.mrk: Avoir la même version de <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform recoveries by copying physical files, the servers must have:

seg-source.mrk: If you want to perform recoveries by copying physical files, the servers must have:

target.mrk: Si vous voulez effectuer des récupérations en copiant les fichiers physiques, les serveurs doivent avoir :

trans-unit.source: The same architecture.

seg-source.mrk: The same architecture.

target.mrk: La même architecture.

trans-unit.source: The same operating system.

seg-source.mrk: The same operating system.

target.mrk: Le même système d’exploitation.

trans-unit.source: Each replication node must have access to these ports:

seg-source.mrk: Each replication node must have access to these ports:

target.mrk: Chaque nœud de réplication doit avoir accès à ces ports :

trans-unit.source: 8181. Communication port for .

seg-source.mrk: Communication port for <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Permet l’accès à la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: 9080. Communication port for in non encrypted mode, and it is used by replication. If you choose another value on the target node, you must specify it to the source node.

seg-source.mrk: Communication port for <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in non encrypted mode, and it is used by replication.
If you choose another value on the target node, you must specify it to the source node.

target.mrk: Port de communication pour <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode non crypté, et il est utilisé par réplication.
Si vous choisissez une autre valeur sur le serveur cible, vous devez le spécifier sur le serveur source.

trans-unit.source: To do so, edit the /advsettings.cfg file on the source node, and add this line:

seg-source.mrk: To do so, edit the /advsettings.cfg file on the source node, and add this line:

target.mrk: Pour cela, éditez le fichier /advsettings.cfg sur le nœud source, et ajoutez cette ligne :

trans-unit.source: HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT=XXXX

seg-source.mrk: HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT=XXXX

target.mrk: HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT=XXXX

trans-unit.source: Where XXXX is the port number you choose.

seg-source.mrk: Where XXXX is the port number you choose.

target.mrk: Où XXXX est le numéro de port que vous choisissez.

trans-unit.source: 23232. Communication port for .

seg-source.mrk: Communication port for <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Permet l’accès à l'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Do not forget to create adequate rules in your firewall configuration.

seg-source.mrk: Do not forget to create adequate rules in your firewall configuration.

target.mrk: N’oubliez pas de créer les règles adéquates dans la configuration de votre pare-feu.

trans-unit.source: Disaster Recovery Prerequisites

seg-source.mrk: Disaster Recovery Prerequisites

target.mrk: Conditions préalables à la reprise d’activité (Disaster Recovery)

trans-unit.source: Sooner or later, your system may suffer from hardware issues or file system corruption. For instance, a hard drive failure of the disk where the block files are stored may corrupt the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server. Disaster Recovery is the feature used to rebuild a server from replicated data stored on another server. To enable the use of this feature, you must follow some prerequisites.

seg-source.mrk: Sooner or later, your system may suffer from hardware issues or file system corruption.

For instance, a hard drive failure of the disk where the block files are stored may corrupt the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.
Disaster Recovery is the feature used to rebuild a server from replicated data stored on another server.
To enable the use of this feature, you must follow some prerequisites.

target.mrk: Tôt ou tard, votre système peut subir des problèmes de matériel ou la corruption du système de fichiers.

Par exemple, une défaillance du disque dur sur lequel les fichiers blocs sont stockés peut corrompre le serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Le Disaster Recovery est la fonction utilisée pour reconstruire un serveur à partir de données répliquées et stockées sur un autre serveur.
Pour permettre l'utilisation de cette fonctionnalité, vous devez remplir quelques conditions préalables.

trans-unit.source: About Bootstrap Configuration Files

seg-source.mrk: About Bootstrap Configuration Files

target.mrk: A propos des fichiers d’amorçage

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap configuration files are <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server files used to record configuration information necessary to rebuild your server in case of disaster.

seg-source.mrk: Bootstrap configuration files are <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server files used to record configuration information necessary to rebuild your server in case of disaster.

target.mrk: Les fichiers d’amorçage (bootstrap files) sont des fichiers du serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> qui sont utilisés pour enregistrer les informations nécessaires à la reconstruction du serveur en cas de défaillance.

trans-unit.source: To use the disaster recovery replication feature, you need an up-to-date copy of those bootstrap configuration files.

seg-source.mrk: To use the disaster recovery replication feature, you need an up-to-date copy of those bootstrap configuration files.

target.mrk: Pour effectuer des opérations de reprise d’activité (disaster recovery) avec les fonctionnalités de réplication, vous aurez besoin d’une copie à jour de ces fichiers d’amorçage (bootstrap files).

trans-unit.source: It is therefore very important that you copy these files to a safe place each time you make significant modifications to your configuration such as adding a replication source or target, or adding new agents.

seg-source.mrk: It is therefore very important that you copy these files to a safe place each time you make significant modifications to your configuration such as adding a replication source or target, or adding new agents.

target.mrk: Il est donc très important que vous fassiez des copies de ces fichiers dans un emplacement sécurisé chaque fois que vous effectuez des modifications importantes sur votre configuration, tel l’ajout d’une source ou d’une destination pour la réplication ou la déclaration de nouveaux agents.

trans-unit.source: These are the three bootstrap configuration files, that are by default located in these directories (if you modified the default path during the installation, modify these paths accordingly):

seg-source.mrk: These are the three bootstrap configuration files, that are by default located in these directories (if you modified the default path during the installation, modify these paths accordingly):

target.mrk: Il existe trois fichiers d’amorçage, qui se trouvent par défaut dans ces répertoires (si vous avez modifié le chemin par défaut lors de l’installation, modifiez en conséquence ces chemins) :

trans-unit.source: \AdminDB\HNServerClients.xml

seg-source.mrk: \AdminDB\HNServerClients.xml

target.mrk: \AdminDB\HNServerClients.xml

trans-unit.source: For instance:

seg-source.mrk: For instance:

target.mrk: Par exemple :

trans-unit.source:
C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerClients.xml

seg-source.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerClients.xml

target.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerClients.xml

trans-unit.source: \AdminDB\HNServerRules.xml

seg-source.mrk: \AdminDB\HNServerRules.xml

target.mrk: \AdminDB\HNServerRules.xml

trans-unit.source: For instance:

seg-source.mrk: For instance:

target.mrk: Par exemple :

trans-unit.source:
C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerRules.xml

seg-source.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerRules.xml

target.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\HSX\AdminDB\
HNServerRules.xml

trans-unit.source: \Conf\config.xml

seg-source.mrk: \Conf\config.xml

target.mrk: \Conf\config.xml

trans-unit.source: For instance:

seg-source.mrk: For instance:

target.mrk: Par exemple :

trans-unit.source:
C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\conf\
config.xml

seg-source.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\conf\
config.xml

target.mrk: C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default\conf\
config.xml

trans-unit.source: Backing up the Bootstrap Configuration Files

seg-source.mrk: Backing up the Bootstrap Configuration Files

target.mrk: Sauvegarde des fichiers d’amorçage

trans-unit.source: Once every hour, an automatic backup of those files is performed in the first declared block repository.

seg-source.mrk: Once every hour, an automatic backup of those files is performed in the first declared block repository.

target.mrk: Une fois par heure, une sauvegarde automatique de ces fichiers de configuration est effectuée dans le premier répertoire de stockage défini sur le serveur.

trans-unit.source: You can still manually back up the bootstrap configuration files.

seg-source.mrk: You can still manually back up the bootstrap configuration files.

target.mrk: Il est cependant possible de sauvegarder manuellement ces fichiers.

trans-unit.source: To back up bootstrap configuration files manually

seg-source.mrk: To back up bootstrap configuration files manually

target.mrk: Sauvegarder manuellement les fichiers d’amorçage

trans-unit.source: On the machine hosting the , launch the ade_admin command line interface:

seg-source.mrk: On the machine hosting the , launch the ade_admin command line interface:

target.mrk: Depuis le système hébergeant , lancez l' interface en ligne de commandeade_admin :

trans-unit.source: Windows.

seg-source.mrk: Windows.

target.mrk: Windows.

trans-unit.source: Select Start  Programs  Atempo Deduplication Engine  Administration.

seg-source.mrk: Select Start  Programs  Atempo Deduplication Engine  Administration.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez DémarrerProgrammes Atempo Deduplication Engine Administration.

trans-unit.source: macOS/Linux.

seg-source.mrk: macOS/Linux.

target.mrk: macOS/Linux.

trans-unit.source: Launch the ./ade_admin command.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ./ade_admin command.

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande ./ade_admin.

trans-unit.source: Provide a password. Two default users exist in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

seg-source.mrk: Provide a password.
Two default users exist in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

target.mrk: Entrez un mot de passe.
Deux utilisateurs par défaut existent dans le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

trans-unit.source: admin, password admin (default user with administrative rights).

seg-source.mrk: admin, password admin (default user with administrative rights).

target.mrk: admin, mot de passe admin (utilisateur par défaut avec des droits d'administration).

trans-unit.source: tina, password tina (default user).

seg-source.mrk: tina, password tina (default user).

target.mrk: tina, mot de passe tina (Utilisateur standard).

trans-unit.source: To launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, run the ./ade_admin -u username command.

seg-source.mrk: To launch the Command Line Interface with a different user, run the ./ade_admin -u username command.

target.mrk: Pour lancer le mode commande avec un autre utilisateur, exécutez la commande ./ade_admin -u nom d'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

seg-source.mrk: You are prompted to enter the password for this user.

target.mrk: Vous devez fournir le mot de passe de cet utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: In ade_admin, launch this command:

seg-source.mrk: In ade_admin, launch this command:

target.mrk: Dans ade_admin, exécutez cette commande :

trans-unit.source: save_cfg

seg-source.mrk: save_cfg

target.mrk: save_cfg

trans-unit.source: is the directory on your server where saves the bootstrap configuration file.

seg-source.mrk: is the directory on your server where saves the bootstrap configuration file.

target.mrk: est le répertoire où va sauvegarder les fichiers d’amorçage.

trans-unit.source: The content of this directory is required to perform a Disaster recovery operation, thus you should keep it in a location that will remain available should the machine where your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server is installed be destroyed.

seg-source.mrk: The content of this directory is required to perform a Disaster recovery operation, thus you should keep it in a location that will remain available should the machine where your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server is installed be destroyed.

target.mrk: Le contenu de ce répertoire étant nécessaire à une procédure de Reprise d’activité (Disaster Recovery), nous vous conseillons de le conserver dans un emplacement qui resterait disponible si la machine sur laquelle est installé votre serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> venait a être détruite.

trans-unit.source: Repeat this operation each time the configuration files are modified, for instance when you add new agents, new replications, new rules, etc.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat this operation each time the configuration files are modified, for instance when you add new agents, new replications, new rules, etc.

target.mrk: Renouvelez cette opération chaque fois que vous modifiez la configuration, par exemple, si vous ajoutez des agents, des réplications, des règles, etc.
